name: Add Facebook Lead Ads lead into Copper, send an Email, and trigger a Drip (Call SMS Email) to the lead via Go4Clients
description: When you get a new response to your Facebook Lead Ads form, Make will automatically create the lead in Copper. Then, Go4Clients will send an email notification to your sales representative , and will trigger a DRIP ( Call, SMS and Email ) to the lead. The call could include IVR to transfer the call to one of your sales representatives. You can close the sale immediately.
